project-basis: I built it using Python, pandas, Bootstrap, iPython, Google Places API, JavaScript, and Tableau
project-future-plans: I will expand it to other types of institutions and crimes. I will eventually create an API for this data making it easier for other developers to access the data.
project-purpose: It analyzes on-campus crimes at public universities (>4-yr curriculum) with a student population of 25,000 and above. It presents analysis on 6-7 different crimes (robbery, forcible sex offense, non-forcible sex offense, aggravated assault, motor vehicle theft, burglary and arson) in each state for a period of time (2001-2013).
project-inspiration: We, at VCU, frequently receive emails about safety incidents late at night. I realized I could use public data to analyze where VCU stands in terms of crime compared to other public universities.
project-lessons-learned: I will expand it to other types of institutions and crimes. I will eventually create an API for this data making it easier for other developers to access the data.
project-accomplishments: I will expand it to other types of institutions and crimes. I will eventually create an API for this data making it easier for other developers to access the data.
project-subtitle: Tracking crimes at VCU for a safer tomorrow
